remarks: A statement close to the axiom of substitution ~ ax-12 .  (Almost) the general statement that ~ ax12i proves.  (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.)
statement:
bj-ax12i.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
bj-ax12i.2 $e |- ( ch -> A. x ch ) $.
bj-ax12i $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. x ( ph -> ps ) ) ) $.
